<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/organizations/{organizationId}/members/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove a member from an organization. Only organization admins can remove members.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
